member.name: T:StringExtensions.StringExtensions
member.summary: This class contain extension functions for string objects.

member.name: M:StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToMd5Hash(System.String)
member.summary: String extension method which converts the input string to hash array.

member.name: M:StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToBoolean(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string to a Boolean (true) value.

member.name: M:StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToShort(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the string representation of a number to its 16-bit signed integer equivalent.

member.name: M:StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToInteger(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the specified string representation of a number to an equivalent 32-bit signed integer.

member.name: M:StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToLong(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the specified string representation of a number to an equivalent 64-bit signed integer.

member.name: M:StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToDateTime(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the specified string representation of a date and time to an equivalent date and time value.

member.name: M:StringExtensions.StringExtensions.CapitalizeFirstLetter(System.String)
member.summary: Static method that uppercases the first letter of given string.

member.name: M:StringExtensions.StringExtensions.GetStringBetween(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: String extension method which returns the substring between two given strings.
member.param: an optional string to search after
an optional string to search before
an optional index to start search from

member.name: M:StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ConvertCyrillicToLatinLetters(System.String)
member.summary: String extension method which converts the cyrillic letters from the input string into their latin representation.

member.name: M:StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ConvertLatinToCyrillicKeyboard(System.String)
member.summary: String extension method which converts the latin letters from the input string into their cyrillic representation.

member.name: M:StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToValidUsername(System.String)
member.summary: String extension method which replaces invalid symbols in the input string with an empty string and converts a valid username.

member.name: M:StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToValidLatinFileName(System.String)
member.summary: String extension method which replaces invalid symbols in the input string with an empty string and converts a valid filename.

member.name: M:StringExtensions.StringExtensions.GetFirstCharacters(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: String extension method which returns first N characters of the input string.
member.param: the count of characters to be returned

member.name: M:StringExtensions.StringExtensions.GetFileExtension(System.String)
member.summary: String extension method which returns the extention of a given filename represented as a string.

member.name: M:StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToContentType(System.String)
member.summary: String extension method which returns the content type of a file determined by its extension.

member.name: M:StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToByteArray(System.String)
member.summary: String extension method which converts the input string to a byte array.
member.returns: Returns a byte array of the input string
